Intervention: • Randomized Survivors to the usual care provided by each of our 4 community partners. The usual care may include but is not limited to support groups, patient navigation, individual, couple or family therapy.
The usual care may include but is not limited to support groups, patient navigation, individual, couple or family therapy.
Eligibility: Survivors: Latina, has been diagnosed with breast cancer, speaks English or Spanish, has a caregiver who is ready to participate.
ICGs: a primary caregiver for a breast cancer survivor in Latina, speak English or Spanish
Unable to understand spoken English and/or Spanish and/or
A cognitive impairment that prevents informed consent (as determined by IPs or co-researchers who are mental health professionals).
Results: Measure the physical functioning of the quality of life; 6 elements; Sommer and then use the IRT to normalize the score. Average of 50; SD of 10. Range of raw score = 6-28; Higher score = higher physical functioning
Title of the arm/group: Survivors of the usual care

- Arm/Group Description: Randomized Survivors to the usual care provided by each of our 4 community partners. Regular care may include, but is not limited to, support groups, patient navigation, individual, couple or family therapy.
Unit of measurement: units on a scale 44.61 (8.71)
Title of the arm/group: Usual care

- Arm/Group Description: Randomized ICGs to the usual care provided by each of our 4 community partners. The usual care may include but is not limited to support groups, patient navigation, individual, couple or family therapy.
Unit of measurement: units on a scale 53.82 (7.34)
